    MINECON 2016将于九月24-25日在阳光明媚的美国加利福尼亚南部的阿纳海姆会议中心召开。这将是有史以来规模最大的MINECON，有12000位参与者！
    虽然我们想与每一位minecraft玩家面对面交流，但是我们只能容纳全球社区中的一小部分。所有的票已经卖完了，但是如果你不能参加MINECON 2016，请不要难过。你还可以通过看我们的周末直播来获取乐趣。把你的minecraft好[sub]基[/sub]友叫来并举办一个私人的MINECON！做爬行者蛋糕！[sub]不会炸吗？[/sub]装扮成你最喜欢的怪物！在无聊的时侯一起玩Minecraft（不会有任何无聊的时候）。
    关于年龄限制的一些信息：3岁或更小的孩子能免费进场。14岁或以下的青年需要一个至少18岁的家长或监护人陪同（他们都需要门票）。如果你是15岁或以上，你可以独自一人参加！


原文：MINECON 2016 will take place on September 24-25 at Anaheim Convention Center in sunny Southern California, US. It’s going to be the biggest MINECON yet, with 12,000 attendees!
Though we'd like to meet every minecrafter face-to-face, we can only accommodate a small chunk of our global community. All the tickets have now sold out, but try not to be sad if you can't attend MINECON 2016. You can still join in the fun by watching our weekend-long livestream. Get your crafter buddies over and have a private MINECON party! Make creeper cakes! Dress up as your favourite mobs! Play Minecraft together during the boring bits (there won’t be any boring bits).
Some quick info about age restrictions: kids of 3 or younger get in for free. Young folk of 14 or under need a parent or guardian with them who is at least 18 (and they all need tickets). If you're 15 or over you can attend by yourself!



原文地址：https://minecraft.net/en/minecon/
